title: Red mullet with tomato and anchovy dressing
description: The delicate flavour of red mullet is wonderful paired with a sharp tomato and anchovy dressing. Top with crispy shallots, garlic and tarragon.
ingredients: 4 x 400g/14oz red mullet, scaled, filleted and pin boned
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 plum tomatoes, blanched, peeled, deseeded and finely chopped
